titleStmt.title: Lawes and ordinances of vvarre, for the better government of His Maiesties Army Royall, in the present expedition for the northern parts, and safety of the kingdome Under the conduct of his Excellence, the Right Honourable Thomas Earl of Arundel and Surrey, Earl Marshall of England, &c. and Generall of His Majesties forces.
Regulations. 1639
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

titleStmt.title: Lawes and ordinances of vvarre, for the better government of His Maiesties Army Royall, in the present expedition for the northern parts, and safety of the kingdome Under the conduct of his Excellence, the Right Honourable Thomas Earl of Arundel and Surrey, Earl Marshall of England, &c. and Generall of His Majesties forces.

titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Arundel, Thomas Howard, Earl of, 1585-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie; and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf contains a woodcut coat of arms.
In this edition, line three of the title page ends: of.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majestie; and
